title: Announcing Emigre Poster Sale
content:
Submitted by [Jared Benson](http://web.archive.org/web/20090524024639/http:/typophile.com/user/3 "View user profile.") : 14.May.2003 2.52pm 

12 Posters Plus Rarities.   
This set includes 12 posters used to promote Emigre magazine,   
fonts, and books. Also includes a set of untrimmed Emigre   
magazine cover press sheets of sold out issues #2, #4, and #9.   
   
Only 40 sets available!   
   
 [http://www.emigre.com/EPosters.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20090524024639/http:/www.emigre.com/EPosters.php)   
   
Price $95 plus Express shipping.   
(Poster sets will NOT be shipped Economy.)   
   
Offer applies to on-line orders only, and is valid through   
May 30th 2003.   
   
--------------------------------------------------------------   
Emigre Inc   
4475 D St   
Sacramento CA 95819   
USA   
   
 [sales@emigre.com](mailto:sales@emigre.com)   
Fax: (916) 451-4351
author: Jared Benson
